essential_properties.name: listId
essential_properties.description: The unique ID of the list object to be retrieved

essential_properties.name: listId
essential_properties.description: The unique ID of the list whose list entries are to be retrieved. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: entityId
essential_properties.description: The unique ID of the entity (person, organization, or opportunity) to add to this list

essential_properties.name: listId
essential_properties.description: The unique ID of the list that contains the specified list_entry_id. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: listEntryId
essential_properties.description: The unique ID of the list entry object to be retrieved

essential_properties.name: listId
essential_properties.description: The unique ID of the list that contains the specified list_entry_id. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

essential_properties.name: listEntryId
essential_properties.description: The unique ID of the list entry object to be deleted
